text:
Choosing the right
health coverage doesn't
have to be a confusing
experience

Smart Choices™ Exchange helps you
understand your options, so you can make smarter
decisions for yourself and your family.

Recommendations are personalized
for each person based on:

Age, gender,
and number of
dependents

Personal
preferences
(example: do you smoke?)

How do you like
to balance costs?

Estimate of your
healthcare use for the
upcoming year

Next, our award-winning
Recommendations Engine
goes to work for you.
With personalized recommendations, you'll be able to compare plans not just based on premium costs, but also on how much you're likely to spend under each plan.

For example, with
Plan 1, the estimated annual
premium is $1,332 a year, and
your estimated out-of-pocket
cost is $562.

...but with Plan 2, the estimated annual premium is $1,070 a year, and your estimated out-of-pocket
cost is $691.
You'll also see comparisons of your maximum expected costs, which you can think of as a 'worst case scenario' â€“ the most you'd likely pay under each plan.
You can easily focus on certain types of plans by adjusting the filters at the top of the page.

You can also sort plan
recommendations based on
what's most meaningful to you.

The Smart Choices
Exchange then allows
you to compare up to
three plans at a time,
side-by-side

When you're ready, just add your selections
to your online shopping cart, and check out.
It's that easy!

Along the way, we'll assist you with resources
such as our web-based library of articles.

With the Smart Choices
Exchange, you'll understand
the total financial risk with
each plan option so you can
make smarter decisions.
Life is unpredictable.
So we want to make your health coverage easy.
